link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 改进 支持服务退出后仍然可以修改当前播放队列
  2. 改进 音乐标签编辑的稳定性和可用性
  3. 翻译 更新 波兰语 (cooky), 巴西葡萄牙语 (FalaTudo)
releaseNote.en:
1. Improve: support modifying playing queue even if service quits
  2. Improve: enhance stability and usability of music tag viewer or editor
  3. Translation: update Polish (by cooky), Brazilian Portuguese (by FalaTudo)

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 服务退出后无法显示任何图像 (自 v1.9.1 起)
  2. 修复 夜间模式下部分对话框中文本颜色问题
  3. 新增 支持清理收藏夹和播放队列中丢失或删除的歌曲
  4. 改进 显示收藏夹中丢失或删除歌曲的路径而不是完全空白
  5. 开发 更新依赖
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: no images could be displayed once service exits (since v1.9.1)
  2. Fix: text color legibility in some dialogs in night mode
  3. New: support removing the missing (deleted) songs in Favorites Playlist and Playing Queue
  4. Improve: show paths of the missing (deleted) songs instead of complete blank in Favorites Playlist
  5. Development: update dependencies
